title: Ted Gibson Indivdual Color Conditioner, Glimmering Gold, 10-Ounce Bottle
description: Ted Gibson introduces "Individual Color" a revolutionary line of shampoos and conditioners specially formulated to deliver clean, customized color for color-treated hair or natural hair.  Infused with Wild Orchid Extract to protect hair from moisture loss and refreshes and tones the scalp.  Natural Lavender to calm and soothe and Natural Jojoba that mimics natural body oil to moisturize the scalp.

title: Tressa Watercolors Shampoo - Fluid Fire 8.5 oz
description: Use on Medium to Dark Red hair. Creates bright, passionate, fiery red-orange tones.rnrnA 3-in-1 shampoo for every color client, Watercolors cleanses, conditions and refreshes color in one easy step. Specially formulated Reflective Color Enhancers to deliver pure, intense tones and brilliant shine, while a rich, foaming lather nourishes every hair strand. Tone and maintain color treated hair, or enhance normal hair's natural hues. Watercolors is the ultimate color enhancing, conditioning shampoo.
